title-part.text: MACHINES FOR MAKING CIGARS OR CIGARETTES

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.

reference.text: combinations of two or more elements of cigar manufacture A24C3/00; attaching or incorporating filters or mouthpieces A24C5/47, A24C5/52; cutting machines in general B26D

title-part.text: Tobacco-feeding devices with or without means for dividing the tobacco into measured quantities
Devices for cutting cigar binders or wrappers
Bunch-making machines with aprons and tables for wrapping
Moulds or presses for cigar bunches
Devices for applying the wrapper to the bunch
Devices for forming the tips of cigars
Final treatment of cigars, e.g. sorting
Bundling and pressing devices for cigars
Combinations of two or more elements of cigar manufacture
Making tipping materials for, or attaching filters or mouthpieces to, cigars or cigarettes

CPC-specific-text.text: Feeding arrangements for individual paper wrappers

title-part.text: Making cigarettes for simulated smoking devices

note.note-paragraph:
Group A24C5/01 is incomplete pending reclassification of documents from groups A24B3/14, A24F47/004, A24F47/006, and A24F47/008.
All groups listed in this Warning should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

title-part.text: Machines with aprons and tables for wrapping
Cutting the ends of filled and rolled cigarettes

CPC-specific-text.text: containing parts of different densities, e.g. dense ends
containing different tobacco mixtures, e.g. composite rods
Separating devices, e.g. winnowing, removing impurities
Devices for regulating the tobacco quantity
for cigarettes with an axial air duct
with additives, e.g. binding agent, flavorants

title-part.text: Machines combined with devices for grinding the knives
with special arrangements coming into operation during starting, slowing-down or breakdown of the machine, e.g. for diverting or breaking the continuous rod
Separating, ordering, counting or examining cigarettes
Regulating the feeding of tobacco according to rod or cigarette condition

CPC-specific-text.text: Construction details of the cigarette transport drum
for combining several rows into one

title-part.text: Examining cigarettes or the rod, e.g. for regulating the feeding of tobacco

note.note-paragraph:
Group A24C5/3406 is impacted by reclassification into groups A24F40/80 and A24F42/90.
Groups A24C5/3406, A24F40/80, and A24F42/90 should be considered in order to perform a complete search.

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of light, radiation or electrostatic fields

title-part.text: Adaptations of conveying apparatus for transporting cigarettes from making machine to packaging machine
Filling the boats at the making machine
Emptying the boats into the hopper of the packaging machine
Removing papers or other parts from defective cigarettes

reference.text: regulating feed according to rod or cigarette condition A24C5/34

CPC-specific-text.text: feeding to several cigarette making machines
with arrangements in the hopper, e.g. for spreading, tamping
with separating means, e.g. winnowing, removing impurities
with means for regulating the tobacco quantity
Component parts or details, e.g. feed roller, feed belt
for obtaining cigarettes of various lengths

reference.text: making paper tubes in general B31C

CPC-specific-text.text: the paper tubes partially containing a filter element

title-part.text: Attaching filters or mouthpieces to cigars or cigarettes, e.g. inserting filters into cigarettes or their mouthpieces

CPC-specific-text.text: by means of a connecting band
Applying adhesives to the connecting band
by inserting filters into cigarettes or their mouthpieces
adapted for cigars or cigarettes with a hollow mouthpiece, e.g. recess filter cigarettes
with a mouthpiece made from plastic, wood or the like
Transport means for filter- or cigarette-rods in view of their assembling

title-part.text: Incorporating filters or mouthpieces into a cigarette rod or a tobacco rod
Folding the ends of cigarette paper tubes after filling them with tobacco
Making tipping materials, e.g. sheet cork for mouthpieces of cigars or cigarettes, by mechanical means

CPC-specific-text.text: by treating the tipping material with a liquid or viscous solution, e.g. paraffine
to a continuous web of cigarette paper

title-part.text: Final treatment of cigarettes, e.g. marking, printing, branding, decorating

CPC-specific-text.text: Pressing of cigarettes, e.g. for obtaining an oval form
Treating cigarettes with a liquid or viscous solution
